name: PowerCenter:Set "Fail parent if this task fails" on tasks
description: In order to stop the workflow if a task failed, it is mandatory to set the property « Fail parent if this task fails » to true on each task.
output:
This report lists all Workflow with Tasks containing "Fail parent if this task fails" not set up.
It provides the following information:
Workflow full name, Task full name
rationale: This property allows you to stop executing Tasks in case of errors encountered on preceding ones. Unhandled executions could lead to data corruption and impact robustness.
remediation: Set "Fail parent if this task fails" on Tasks in a Workflow.
total: Total number of Workflows and Worklets

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling
